astrologer:Strike.NAME: Strike
astrologer:Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL astrologer:Solar: Deal !M! additional damage.

astrologer:Defend.NAME: Defend
astrologer:Defend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL astrologer:Lunar: Gain !M! additional Block.

astrologer:Stardust.NAME: Stardust
astrologer:Stardust.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase. Draw a card.
astrologer:Stardust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase. Draw !M! cards.

astrologer:Perihelion.NAME: Perihelion
astrologer:Perihelion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL astrologer:Solar: Deal !M! times as much damage instead.

astrologer:Premeditation.NAME: Premeditation
astrologer:Premeditation.DESCRIPTION: Draw the bottom card of your draw pile, then play and Exhaust it.

astrologer:Wish.NAME: Wish
astrologer:Wish.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each astrologer:Star card Exhausted this combat. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

astrologer:NewMoon.NAME: New Moon
astrologer:NewMoon.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL astrologer:Lunar: Increase the damage and Block of the drawn cards by !M! for the rest of combat.

astrologer:Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
astrologer:Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL astrologer:Lunar: Apply !M! Weak.

astrologer:Eclipse.NAME: Eclipse
astrologer:Eclipse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL astrologer:Lunar: Hits !M! additional time.
astrologer:Eclipse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL astrologer:Lunar: Hits !M! additional times.

astrologer:Radiance.NAME: Radiance
astrologer:Radiance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL astrologer:Solar: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

astrologer:GlassStar.NAME: Glass Star
astrologer:GlassStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Exhaust the next card you play and gain Block equal to !M! times its cost.

astrologer:StarOfChange.NAME: Star Of Change
astrologer:StarOfChange.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, Exhaust a card in your hand and add a random card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
astrologer:StarOfChange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, Exhaust a card in your hand and add a random upgraded card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

astrologer:FrozenStar.NAME: Frozen Star
astrologer:FrozenStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL The next time you play a astrologer:Star card, gain !B! Block.

astrologer:LonelyStar.NAME: Lonely Star
astrologer:LonelyStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, draw !M! cards.

astrologer:ShiningStar.NAME: Shining Star
astrologer:ShiningStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, apply !M! astrologer:Starlit to a random enemy.

astrologer:FadingStar.NAME: Fading Star
astrologer:FadingStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:GiantStar.NAME: Giant Star
astrologer:GiantStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Exhaust. NL When this card is Exhausted, add !M! random astrologer:Meteor cards to your hand. NL astrologer:Supermassive 1: Increase the number of cards added by 1.

astrologer:NeutronStar.NAME: Neutron Star
astrologer:NeutronStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Apply X astrologer:Starlit. NL Deal !D! damage for each stack of astrologer:Starlit the enemy has.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: (Deals !M! damage.) NL astrologer:Star. NL Apply X astrologer:Starlit. NL Deal !D! damage for each stack of astrologer:Starlit the enemy has.

astrologer:ShootingStar.NAME: Shooting Star
astrologer:ShootingStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL astrologer:Meteor. NL Draw a card.
astrologer:ShootingStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL astrologer:Meteor. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
astrologer:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL astrologer:Meteor. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! astrologer:Starlit.

astrologer:StarOfCourage.NAME: Star of Courage
astrologer:StarOfCourage.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Gain !M! Strength for each card Exhausted.

astrologer:StarOfMisfortune.NAME: Star of Misfortune
astrologer:StarOfMisfortune.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Apply !M! Weak. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

astrologer:Prestidigitation.NAME: Prestidigitation
astrologer:Prestidigitation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and put !M! card on the bottom of your draw pile.

astrologer:Retelling.NAME: Retelling
astrologer:Retelling.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your hand into your draw pile, then put that many cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
astrologer:Retelling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your hand into your draw pile, then put that many plus !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:Divination.NAME: Divination
astrologer:Divination.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand onto the bottom of your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards.
astrologer:Divination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put any number of cards from your hand onto the bottom of your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards.

astrologer:Conjunction.NAME: Conjunction
astrologer:Conjunction.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, gain !B! Block.

astrologer:Opposition.NAME: Opposition
astrologer:Opposition.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

astrologer:Trine.NAME: Trine
astrologer:Trine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, the next card you play this turn is played twice.

astrologer:Sextile.NAME: Sextile
astrologer:Sextile.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, put a copy of a card in your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

astrologer:Quincunx.NAME: Quincunx
astrologer:Quincunx.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, a random enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

astrologer:Novile.NAME: Novile
astrologer:Novile.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, gain [E] .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, gain

astrologer:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
astrologer:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL astrologer:Supermassive 2: Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

astrologer:MeteorShower.NAME: Meteor Shower
astrologer:MeteorShower.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Meteor. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

astrologer:CometStrike.NAME: Comet Strike
astrologer:CometStrike.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Meteor. NL Deal !D! damage. Draw !M! card.

astrologer:Fate.NAME: Fate
astrologer:Fate.DESCRIPTION: The next [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] card played this turn will be active. NL Exhaust.
astrologer:Fate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] card played this turn will be active.

astrologer:TheFool.NAME: The Fool
astrologer:TheFool.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: 50% chance to deal !D! damage.

astrologer:TheMagician.NAME: The Magician
astrologer:TheMagician.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this combat. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Play a random card from your draw pile that you have not played this combat.
astrologer:TheMagician.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this combat. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Play a random card from your draw pile or discard pile that you have not played this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this combat. NL (Deals !D! damage.)
NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Play a random card from your draw pile that you have not played this combat.
NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Play a random card from your draw pile or discard pile that you have not played this combat.

astrologer:TheHighPriestess.NAME: The High Priestess
astrologer:TheHighPriestess.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of the top card of your draw pile by !M! for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Reduce the cost of the previous card played by !M! for the rest of combat.

astrologer:TheEmpress.NAME: The Empress
astrologer:TheEmpress.DESCRIPTION: [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: ALL enemies lose HP equal to the total amount of damage they intend to deal.

astrologer:TheEmperor.NAME: The Emperor
astrologer:TheEmperor.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Enemy loses three times as much Strength. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:TheHierophant.NAME: The Hierophant
astrologer:TheHierophant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. At the end of the turn, lose !M! Dexterity. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Remove all debuffs. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:TheLovers.NAME: The Lovers
astrologer:TheLovers.DESCRIPTION: Choose two cards in your hand. Exchange their costs for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: The chosen cards will be played twice the next time you play them.

astrologer:TheChariot.NAME: The Chariot
astrologer:TheChariot.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Exhaust. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Gain 1 Intangible.

astrologer:Strength.NAME: Strength
astrologer:Strength.DESCRIPTION: [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Gain !M! Strength for each enemy in combat. Exhaust.

astrologer:TheHermit.NAME: The Hermit
astrologer:TheHermit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card played this turn. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Put the bottom card of your draw pile into your hand. It costs 1 less this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card played this turn. NL (Gain !M! Block.) NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Put the bottom card of your draw pile into your hand. It costs 1 less this turn.

astrologer:WheelofFortune.NAME: Wheel of Fortune
astrologer:WheelofFortune.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Lose 15 Gold. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Play !M! random [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] cards. Their [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] effects are triggered.

astrologer:Justice.NAME: Justice
astrologer:Justice.DESCRIPTION: ALL creatures gain !B! Block. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: ALL enemies lose HP equal to double their current Block.

astrologer:TheHangedMan.NAME: The Hanged Man
astrologer:TheHangedMan.DESCRIPTION: [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Choose a card in your hand. Exhaust ALL cards in your draw pile. Add a copy of the chosen card to your draw pile for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.
astrologer:TheHangedMan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Choose a card in your hand. Exhaust ALL cards in your draw pile. Add a copy of the chosen card to your draw pile for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:Death.NAME: Death
astrologer:Death.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Kill the target non-boss enemy.

astrologer:Temperance.NAME: Temperance
astrologer:Temperance.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand. Heal !M! HP for each card Exhausted.

astrologer:TheDevil.NAME: The Devil
astrologer:TheDevil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Lose 6 HP. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
astrologer:TheDevil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Lose 6 HP. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Raise your Max HP by 3. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:TheTower.NAME: The Tower
astrologer:TheTower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! additional times.

astrologer:TheStar.NAME: The Star
astrologer:TheStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Deal damage equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase to ALL enemies. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Deals twice as much damage.
astrologer:TheStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Deal damage equal to twice the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase to ALL enemies. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Deals twice as much damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Deal damage equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase to ALL enemies. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Deals twice as much damage. NL (Deals !D! damage.)
astrologer:Star. NL Deal damage equal to twice the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase to ALL enemies. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Deals twice as much damage. NL (Deals !D! damage.)

astrologer:TheMoon.NAME: The Moon
astrologer:TheMoon.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Lunar: Gain Block equal to half of the total damage enemies intend to do. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Lunar: Gain Block equal to half of the total damage enemies intend to do. NL (Gain !B! Block.) NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

astrologer:TheSun.NAME: The Sun
astrologer:TheSun.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL astrologer:Solar: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

astrologer:Judgement.NAME: Judgement
astrologer:Judgement.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: If this kills a non-minion enemy, reduce its cost by !M! permanently.

astrologer:TheWorld.NAME: The World
astrologer:TheWorld.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR_VARIABLE!: Set the HP of ALL creatures to 50% of your Max HP. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.
